vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βοός and Βοές (RV, Βοάζ, Rec. Βοόζ), ὁ, indecl. (Heb. בֹּעַז),
Boaz (Rut.2:1): Mat.1:5, Luk.3:32.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.2.1;
son of: Salmon (H8007) and Rahab (H7343); married to Ruth (H7327);
father of: Obed (H5744)
§ Boaz, [perhaps] "in him is strength"
Boaz, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 1:5*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
波阿斯 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "在他裡面是力量"
路得的親戚, 之後為她第二任的丈夫
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
波阿斯 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "在他里面是力量"
路得的亲戚, 之后为她第二任的丈夫
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Bô-ô; Bô-a. con trai của Sanh-môn và Ra-háp, chồng của Ru-tơ cha của Ô-bết. Xem H1162.
